name: An Octave Apart
description:

-----------------------------------------------------------

Game Name: An Octave Apart.

In An Octave Apart, you play as a street musician's assistant. You need to help improve his show by finding other street musicians and bringing them back to your boss regardless of how their fans feel about it.

When the player picks up a musician, they will be granted a special power which will help them get back to their boss and escape the angry crowd.

------------------------------------------

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Pickup/Put down musician: E

Stun: F (When holding drummer)

Super jump: hold space (When holding guitarist)

-----------------------------------------------------------

There are no textures used on any of the materials in game. All materials are fully procedural.

All assets except for kitbash, and one sound effect from dynamedion we love indies were made during the jam. All of the kitbash models used, were also heavily modified. From code, to 3D models, to materials, to music.

-------------------------------------------------------------
